files.content:
# misaka document

<!-- TOC -->
- [Variables](#misaka-variables)
     - [Folder and File names](#Folder-and-File-names)

       - [`%Misaka_Path{'DeviceType'}%`](#misaka_pathdevicetype)
       - [`%Misaka_AppUUID{'bundle id', 'Bundle'}%`](#misaka_appuuidbundle-id-bundle)
       - [`%Misaka_Segment{Name: 'target file name', [(Identifier: 'iOSver', Value: '16')]}%`](#misaka_segmentName-target-file-name-identifier-iOSver-Value-16)
       - [`%Misaka_Binary%`](#misaka_binary)
     - [Inside Plist and Loctable files](#Inside-Plist-and-Loctable-files)
       - [`%Misaka_Overwrite%`](#misaka_overwrite)
       - [`%Misaka_Remove%`](#misaka_remove)
       - [`%Misaka_Path{'SpringLang'}%`](#misaka_pathspringlang-1)
- [Config.plist(Advanced Settings)](#configplistadvanced-settings)
     - [Basic form](#basic-form)
       - [Link](#link)
       - [Image](#image)
       - [Text(Readme)](#textreadme)
       - [ImagePicker](#imagepicker)
       - [FilePicker](#filepicker)
       - [ColorPicker](#colorpicker)
       - [ColorPicker_Hex](#colorpicker_hex)
       - [Int](#int)
       - [Double](#double)
       - [Toggle](#toggle)
       - [Segment](#segment)
       - [Navigation link](#navigation-link)
       - [Picker](#picker)
       - [Hider toggle](#hider-toggle)
       - [Preset](#preset)
     - [How to combine with variables](#how-to-combine-with-variables)
       - [File names](#file-names)
       - [Inside files](#inside-files)
 
<!-- /TOC -->

# Variables

## Folder and File names

### `%Misaka_Path{'SpringLang'}%`

```
ja.lproj / CoverSheet.strings
â†“
%Misaka_Path{'SpringLang'}%.lproj / CoverSheet.strings
```

### `%Misaka_Path{'DeviceType'}%`

```
DefaultModuleSettings~iphone.plist
â†“
DefaultModuleSettings~%Misaka_Path{'DeviceType'}%.plist
```

### `%Misaka_AppUUID{'bundle id', 'Bundle'}%`
### `%Misaka_AppUUID{'bundle id', 'Data'}%`
### `%Misaka_AppUUID{'bundle id', 'AppGroup'}%`

```
Application / 0B0E8030-EC09-4FE2-A6D9-D225F4A46C44
â†“
Application / %Misaka_AppUUID{'org.mozilla.ios.Firefox', 'Bundle'}%
```

### `%Misaka_Segment{Name: 'target file name', [(Identifier: 'iOSver', Value: '16')]}%`
### `%Misaka_Segment{Name: 'target file name', [(Identifier: 'Notched', Value: 'Yes')]}%`
### `%Misaka_Segment{Name: 'target file name', [(Identifier: 'DeviceType', Value: 'iPad')]}%`
### `%Misaka_Segment{Name: 'target file name', [(Identifier: 'Option', Value: 'Option1')]}%`

```
BackBoardServices.framework
â†“
%Misaka_Segment{Name: 'BackBoardServices.framework', [(Identifier: 'resplogo', Value: 'SANS'), (Identifier: 'iOSver', Value: '16')]}%
```

### `%Optional%`

```
lock@2x-812h.ca / main.caml
lock@3x-d73.ca / main.caml
â†“
lock@2x-812h.ca / %Optional%main.caml
lock@3x-d73.ca / %Optional%main.caml
```

### `%Misaka_Regex%`

```
1880.WWDC_2021-414w-896h@2x~iphone.wallpaper
â†“
%Misaka_Regex%1880.WWDC_2021-(.+)~iphone.wallpaper
```

### `%Misaka_Resize%`

**Deprecated**
```
en-0---white.png
â†“
%Misaka_Resize%en-0---white.png
```

### `%Misaka_Binary%`

```
LightStandard.car
â†“
%Misaka_Binary%LightStandard.car
```

Inside Files
```
{
    "Overwrite": {
        "16088": "darkAccent",
        "16248": "darkAccent"
    }
}
```

## Inside Plist and Loctable files

### `%Misaka_Overwrite%`
### `%Misaka_Remove%`

`%Misaka_Remove%` is used to reduce file size.

```
<key>%Misaka_Overwrite%</key> <string></string>
<key>Key2</key> <string>Edited</string>
<key>Key5</key> <string>%Misaka_Remove%</string>
```

### `%Misaka_Path{'SpringLang'}%`

Inside loctable files(ios16)
```
<key>en</key>
<key>ja</key>
â†“
<key>%Misaka_Path{'SpringLang'}%</key>
```

# Config.plist(Advanced Settings)

File structure
```
ColorCC(tweak name)
  â”œâ”€config.plist
  â””â”€Overwrite
      â””â”€System
          â””â”€...
```

## Basic form
```
Root
  â”œâ”€Item 0[Dictionary]
  â”‚   â”œâ”€Category
  â”‚   â””â”€Tweaks[Array]
  â”‚       â”œâ”€Item 0[Dictionary]
  â”‚       â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(Exmaple)
  â”‚       â”‚   â”œâ”€Type(String)
  â”‚       â”‚   â”œâ”€UI(Link)
  â”‚       â”‚   â””â”€URL(https://exmple.com)
  â”‚       â”‚
  â”‚       â””â”€...Item x
  â””â”€...Item x
```

## Link
![Sample Link](/Sample/Sample.Link.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.Link.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 0[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Label(Straight Tamago)
    â”œâ”€UI(Link)
    â””â”€URL(https://example.com)
```

## Image
![Sample Image](/Sample/Sample.Image.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.Image.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 1[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€UI(Image)
    â”œâ”€URL(https://exmple.com/exmaple.jpg)
    â”œâ”€Height(0)
    â””â”€Width(0)
```

## Text(Readme)
![Sample TextReadme](/Sample/Sample.TextReadme.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.TextReadme.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 2[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Label(Hello.)
    â””â”€UI(Text)
```

## Text input
![Sample TextInput](/Sample/Sample.TextInput.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.TextInput.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 3[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Identifier
    â”œâ”€Label(Widget text)
    â”œâ”€Type(String)
    â””â”€Value(Hello)
```

## ImagePicker
![Sample ImagePicker](/Sample/Sample.ImagePicker.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.ImagePicker.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 4[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Label(Slect image)
    â”œâ”€UI(ImagePicker)
    â””â”€URL(/var/mobile/Documents/sample.jp)
```

## FilePicker
![Sample FilePicker](/Sample/Sample.FilePicker.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.FilePicker.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 5[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Label(Slect file) 
    â”œâ”€UI(FilePicker)
    â””â”€URL(/System/Library/Fonts/CoreUI/SFUI.ttf)
```

## ColorPicker
![Sample ColorPicker](/Sample/Sample.ColorPicker.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.ColorPicker.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 6[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Identifier
    â”œâ”€Label(Slect color) 
    â”œâ”€Type(Color_Tinting)
    â””â”€Value[Dictionary]
        â”œâ”€tintAlpha(0.8) [Number]
        â””â”€tintColor[Dictionary]
            â”œâ”€alpha(1) [Number]
            â”œâ”€blue(0.76) [Number]
            â”œâ”€green(0.76) [Number]
            â””â”€red(0.76) [Number]
```

## ColorPicker_Hex
```
â””â”€Item 7[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Identifier
    â”œâ”€Label(Color select) 
    â”œâ”€Type(Color_Hex)
    â”œâ”€Value(C46661FF)
    â””â”€Param
        â”œâ”€BGRA[Boolean]
        â””â”€NoHash[Boolean]
```

## Int
![Sample Int](/Sample/Sample.Int.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.Int.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 8[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Identifier
    â”œâ”€Label(Blur)
    â”œâ”€Type(Int)
    â”œâ”€Min(0) [Number]
    â”œâ”€Max(100) [Number]
    â”œâ”€Step(2) [Number]
    â””â”€Value(66) [Number]
```

## Double
![Sample Double](/Sample/Sample.Double.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.Double.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 9[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Identifier
    â”œâ”€Label(Blur)
    â”œâ”€Type(Double)
    â”œâ”€Min(0) [Number]
    â”œâ”€Max(100) [Number]
    â”œâ”€Step(1) [Number]
    â””â”€Value(66) [Number]
```

## Toggle
![Sample Toggle](/Sample/Sample.Toggle.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.Toggle.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 10[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Identifier
    â”œâ”€Label(ConnecitivityModule)
    â”œâ”€Type(Bool)
    â”œâ”€UI(Toggle)
    â””â”€Value[Boolean]
```

## Segment
![Sample Segment](/Sample/Sample.Segment.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.Segment.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 11[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Identifier
    â”œâ”€Type(String)
    â”œâ”€UI(SegmentedControl)
    â”œâ”€Value(sample.segment1)
    â””â”€Selection[Array]
        â”œâ”€Item 0[Dictionary]
        â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(ConnecitivityModule)
        â”‚   â””â”€Value(sample.segment1)
        â”œâ”€Item 1[Dictionary]
        â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(Nowplyaing)
        â”‚   â””â”€Value(sample.segment2)
        â””â”€...Item x
```

## Navigation link
![Sample NavigationLink](/Sample/Sample.NavigationLink.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.NavigationLink.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 12[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Label(Links)
    â”œâ”€UI(NavigationLink)
    â””â”€Categories[Array]
        â”œâ”€Item 0[Dictionary]
        â”‚   â”œâ”€Category
        â”‚   â””â”€Tweaks[Array]
        â”‚       â”œâ”€Item 0[Dictionary]
        â”‚       â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(Twitter)
        â”‚       â”‚   â”œâ”€UI(Link)
        â”‚       â”‚   â””â”€URL(https://exmple.com)
        â”‚       â”œâ”€Item 1[Dictionary]
        â”‚       â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(Bento)
        â”‚       â”‚   â”œâ”€UI(Link)
        â”‚       â”‚   â””â”€URL(https://exmple2.com)
        â”‚       â””â”€...Item x
        â””â”€...Item x
```

## Picker
![Sample Picker](/Sample/Sample.Picker.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.Picker.misaka)
```
â””â”€Item 13[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Identifier
    â”œâ”€Label(Slect)
    â”œâ”€LabelPosition(Left)
    â”œâ”€UI(Picker)
    â”œâ”€Value(sample.picker2)
    â””â”€Selection[Array]
        â”œâ”€Item 0[Dictionary]
        â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(ConnecitivityModule)
        â”‚   â””â”€Value(sample.picker1)
        â”œâ”€Item 1[Dictionary]
        â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(Nowplyaing)
        â”‚   â””â”€Value(sample.picker2)
        â””â”€...Item x
```

## Hider toggle
![Sample HiderToggle](/Sample/Sample.HiderToggle.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.HiderToggle.misaka)
```
â”œâ”€Item 14[Dictionary]
â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(Advanced)
â”‚   â”œâ”€UI(Hider_Toggle)
â”‚   â”œâ”€Value[Boolean]
â”‚   â””â”€Identifiers[Dictionary]
â”‚       â”œâ”€To_Disable[Array]
â”‚       â”‚   â””â”€Item 0(link1)
â”‚       â””â”€To_Enable[Array]
â”‚           â””â”€Item 0(link2)
â”œâ”€Item 15[Dictionary]
â”‚   â”œâ”€Identifier(link1)
â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(exmaple.com)
â”‚   â”œâ”€UI(Link)
â”‚   â””â”€URL(https://exmple.com)
â”œâ”€Item 16[Dictionary]
â”‚   â”œâ”€Disabled(YES) [Boolean]
â”‚   â”œâ”€Identifier(link2)
â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(Twitter)
â”‚   â”œâ”€UI(Link)
â”‚   â””â”€URL(https://exmple2.com)
â””â”€...Item x
```

## Preset
![Sample Preset](/Sample/Sample.Preset.jpg)

[Sample file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shimajiron/Misaka_Network/main/Sample/Sample.Preset.misaka)
```
â”œâ”€Item 17[Dictionary]
â”‚   â”œâ”€Identifier(sample.preset1)
â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(Module Blur)
â”‚   â”œâ”€Type(Double)
â”‚   â”œâ”€Min(0) [Number]
â”‚   â”œâ”€Max(100) [Number]
â”‚   â”œâ”€Step(1) [Number]
â”‚   â””â”€Value(27) [Number]
â”œâ”€Item 18[Dictionary]
â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(preset1)
â”‚   â”œâ”€UI(Preset)
â”‚   â””â”€Presets[Array]
â”‚       â””â”€Item 0[Dictionary]
â”‚           â”œâ”€Identifier(sample.preset1)
â”‚           â””â”€value(50) [Number]
â””â”€...Item x
```
## How to combine with variables

### File names
Switching between two files.
```
%Misaka_Segment{Name: 'BackBoardServices.framework', [(Identifier: 'resplogo', Value: 'sans')]}%
%Misaka_Segment{Name: 'BackBoardServices.framework', [(Identifier: 'resplogo', Value: 'toriel')]}%
â†“
Item 0[Dictionary]
  â”œâ”€Identifier(resplogo) â†
  â”œâ”€UI(SegmentedControl)
  â””â”€Selection[Array]
      â”œâ”€Item 0[Dictionary]
      â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(Option 1)
      â”‚   â””â”€Value(sans) â†
      â””â”€Item 1[Dictionary]
          â”œâ”€Label(Option 2)
          â””â”€Value(toriel) â†
```

### Inside files
Enable text input from Advanced Settings.
```
<key>%Misaka_Overwrite%</key> <string></string>
<key>SWIPE_UP_TO_OPEN</key> <string>custom.opentext</string>
<key>SWIPE_UP_TO_UNLOCK</key> <string>custom.unlocktext</string>
â†“
â”œâ”€Item 0[Dictionary]
â”‚   â”œâ”€Identifier(custom.opentext) â†
â”‚   â”œâ”€Label(Open text)
â”‚   â”œâ”€Type(String)
â”‚   â””â”€Value(Hello)
â””â”€Item 1[Dictionary]
    â”œâ”€Identifier(custom.unlocktext) â†
    â”œâ”€Label(Unlock text)
    â”œâ”€Type(String)
    â””â”€Value(Good morning)
```

files.name: README.md
files.content:
iOS & tvOS customisation tool for KFD & MDC


English | æ—¥æœ¬èª



The purpose of this application is to give iPhone users the ability to customise their phones without a jailbreak. At this time we have over 24 default repositories and more than 400 tweaks available. *Misaka is offered at no charge if somebody tried to sell it to you, report it*
## Versions Supported | iOS Versions | MDC | KFD | | - | - | - | | 15.0 - 15.7.1 | âœ“ | - | | 15.7.2 - 15.8.1 | - | âœ“ | | 16.0 - 16.1.2 | âœ“ | - | | 16.2 - 16.6.1 | - | âœ“ | | 17.0 & up | - | - | 17.0 & up can use PiP tweaks
## Download

You can download the latest version of misaka from here:

[Download IPA Here](https://github.com/straight-tamago/misaka/releases/latest) *Misaka is available at no cost, you can install it through AltStore, Sideloadly or TrollStore* You can also use this service to install it. http://flekstore.com/MISAKA


## Join Discord Support ğŸ‰ â€¢ Misaka Support âœ¨ **(Sever 1)**: â€¢ Misaka Support âœ¨ **(Sever 2)**: ### Installing TrollStore with misaka [Official Guide](https://ios.cfw.guide/installing-trollhelper-misaka/) ã¾ãã‚é£Ÿã¹ã‚‹ ## Repositories - [**misakaProject**](https://discord.gg/KSExeZVAGX) - misaka.app - [**HackZy**](https://twitter.com/hackzy01) - Aurora - [**EPOS**](https://twitter.com/RealEPOS) - EPOSbox - [**Phuc Do**](https://twitter.com/dobabaophuc) - PhucDo 3.0 âœ¨ - [**ChromiumCandy**](https://twitter.com/ChromiumCandy) - Applicott - [**YangJiii**](https://twitter.com/duongduong0908) - YangJiii ğŸ‰ 2.0 Repo's - [**HÃ¹ng Anhh â¤ï¸**](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100013250296791&mibextid=LQQJ4d) - HÃ¹ng Anhh â™¡ - [**RomLayVN**](https://t.me/romlayvn) - RÃ²m Láº§y VN - [**roeegh**](https://twitter.com/roeegh) - Puck - [**Lemin**](https://github.com/leminlimez) - Lemin - [**DR.Themes**](https://x.com/UAE_AD1001) - DR.Themes - [**doraa**](https://twitter.com/d0ra727) - MeowRepo :3 #DMATK-KK-YH - [**tyler1029**](https://discord.gg/bbJAqj7np5) - tyler10290 - [**Coolwcat**](https://twitter.com/coolwcat) - Coolwcat - [**MR X**](https://twitter.com/mattiaskl) - MR X's Repo ## Private Testers â€¢ [**roeegh**](https://twitter.com/roeegh): Repository & Tweaks; â€¢ [**Coolwcat**](https://twitter.com/coolwcat): Repository & Tweaks; â€¢ [**Little 34306**](https://twitter.com/Little_34306): Repository & Tweaks; â€¢ [**ichitaso**](https://twitter.com/ichitaso): Repository & Tweaks; â€¢ [**YangJiii**](https://twitter.com/duongduong0908): Repository & Tweaks; â€¢ [**fall20c**](https://twitter.com/fall20c): Tweaks; â€¢ [**Sugiuta**](https://twitter.com/sugiuta): Repository & Tweaks; ## Contributors â€¢ [**straight-tamago**](https://twitter.com/straight_tamago): Lead Developer; â€¢ [**Little 34306**](https://twitter.com/Little_34306): KFD Exploit & Offsets; â€¢ [**Lavochka**](https://twitter.com/lavochka04): dylib injection; â€¢ [**AppInstaller iOS**](https://twitter.com/AppInstalleriOS): File Stuff & KFD Offsets; â€¢ [**uz.ra**](https://twitter.com/ChromiumCandy): UI Design; â€¢ [**LeminLimez**](https://twitter.com/LeminLimez): Settings Page; â€¢ [**opa334**](https://x.com/opa334dev): TrollStore; â€¢ [**Alfie**](https://github.com/alfiecg24): TrollStore; â€¢ [**haxi0sm**](https://twitter.com/haxi0sm): Icon Design & Recommended Page; â€¢ [**Serena**](https://twitter.com/CoreSerena): PrivateKits; â€¢ [**htrowii**](https://twitter.com/htrowii): KFD Exploit Code; â€¢ [**wh1te4ever**](https://twitter.com/wh1te4ever): KFD Exploit Code; â€¢ [**p0up0u**](https://twitter.com/_p0up0u_): KFD Exploit Code; â€¢ [**zhuowei**](https://twitter.com/zhuowei): MDC Exploit Code; â€¢ [**ginsudev**](https://twitter.com/ginsudev): MDC Exploit Code; â€¢ [**WDBFontOverwrite**](https://github.com/ginsudev/CVE-2022-46689): MDC Exploit Code; â€¢ [**Ian Beer of Project Zero**](https://twitter.com/i41nbeer): MDC Exploit Code; ## License License information for the libraries used is listed within the app. https://github.com/Lakr233/ColorfulX MIT License Â© 2024 [straight-tamago](https://github.com/straight-tamago)

files.name: README_JA.md
files.content:
iOSãŠã‚ˆã³tvOSã®ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«ï¼ˆKFD/MDCå‘ã‘ï¼‰

ã“ã®ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ç›®çš„ã¯ã€iPhoneãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒè„±ç„ã›ãšã«iOSã‚’ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã™ã€‚ ç¾æ™‚ç‚¹ã§ã¯ã€24 ã‚’è¶…ãˆã‚‹ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆ ãƒªãƒã‚¸ãƒˆãƒªã¨ 400 ã‚’è¶…ãˆã‚‹èª¿æ•´ãŒåˆ©ç”¨å¯èƒ½ã§ã™ã€‚ *Misakaã¯ç„¡æ–™ã§æä¾›ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™èª°ã‹ãŒã‚ãªãŸã«ãã‚Œã‚’è²©å£²ã—ã‚ˆã†ã¨ã—ãŸå ´åˆã€ãã‚Œã‚’å ±å‘Šã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„*

files.name: index.html
files.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>misakaProject</title>
</head>
<body>
    <script>
        const queryString = window.location.search;
        const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(queryString);
        if (urlParams.get('tweak') == undefined) {
            const redirectUrl = "misaka://addrepo="+urlParams.get('repo')
            if (redirectUrl) {
                window.location.href = redirectUrl;
            }
        }else{
            const redirectUrl = "misaka://opentweak="+urlParams.get('repo')+"&"+urlParams.get('tweak')
            if (redirectUrl) {
                window.location.href = redirectUrl;
            }
        }
        var _timerId = setTimeout(function() {
            window.location.href = "https://discord.gg/KSExeZVAGX";
        }, 500);
    </script>
</body>
</html>
